CreateApp.document: 创建GME应用123，开启实时语音服务，使用高音质；开启离线语音服务； 关闭语音过滤服务；关闭ASR语音转文本服务。
CreateApp.title: 使用自定义配置，创建一个GME应用

CreateCustomization.document: 用户使用该接口可以创建语音消息转文本热句模型，以供识别调用
CreateCustomization.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gme.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCustomization
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BizId": 1400000000,
    "TextUrl": "https://gme-xxx.cos.xxx.com/customization/1400000000/1400000000_customization"
}
CreateCustomization.title: 创建语音消息转文本热句模型

DeleteRoomMember.document: 剔除房间内某两个用户
DeleteRoomMember.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gme.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DeleteRoomMember
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DeleteType": "2",
    "RoomId": "100",
    "BizId": "1400000000",
    "Uids": [
        "2",
        "1"
    ],
    "StrUids": []
}
DeleteRoomMember.title: 剔除房间内某两个用户

DescribeAppStatistics.document: 查询实时语音和离线语音2019-08-01至2019-08-03的用量统计
DescribeAppStatistics.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gme.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeAppStatistics
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Services": [
        "VoiceMessage",
        "RealTimeSpeech"
    ],
    "StartDate": "2019-08-01",
    "EndDate": "2019-08-03",
    "BizId": "140000001"
}
DescribeAppStatistics.title: 查询实时语音和离线语音2019-08-01至2019-08-03的用量统计

DescribeRoomInfo.document: 获取房间内用户信息,RoomIds和StrRoomIds填一个即可,若都存在,则优先查询StrRoomIds。

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gme.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeRoomInfo
<公共请求参数>

{
    "RoomIds": [
        "88888"
    ],
    "StrRoomIds": [
        "aaaaa"
    ],
    "SdkAppId": "1400000000"
}
DescribeRoomInfo.title: 获取房间内用户信息

ScanVoice.document: 通过语音文件的方式提交检测任务，回调地址为空，需要通过接口(查询语音检测结果)主动轮询获取检测结果

UpdateScanRooms.document: 更新用户自定义送检房间号
UpdateScanRooms.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: gme.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateScanRooms
<公共请求参数>

{
    "RoomIdRegex": [
        "^[0-9]*$"
    ],
    "RoomIdString": "0001,0002,0003",
    "BizId": 1400000000
}
UpdateScanRooms.title: 更新用户自定义送检房间号

}
UpdateScanUsers.title: 更新用户自定义送检用户号
